isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9200, 9300, 9400 Models Built After January 1, 1995 - ELECTRICAL TROUBLESHOOTING CUMMINS M11 & N14 ELECTRONIC ENGINE SYSTEM - DIAGNOSTICS AND TROUBLESHOOTING - PRO-LINK 9000 DIAGNOSTIC DATA READER (DDR)

svcproc.title: PRO-LINK 9000 DIAGNOSTIC DATA READER (DDR)
svcproc.para: The PRO-LINK 9000 DDR with the Heavy Duty Standard cartridge can also be used with the International Data Link to read active and inactive fault codes through the data link. The use of the DDR or specific codes are not discussed in this manual as the information is part of the Pro-Link documentation.

The Pro-Link can also be used to monitor operation of various switches and controls and perform other diagnostic tasks. The specific capabilities and operating instructions are included in the Pro-Link documentation for the DDR and the cartridge.
